Sentencas: When hydrocarbons are used as a fuel in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), internal steam reforming increases the energy conversion efficiency and simplifies the system, including the balance-of-plant.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: However, conventional nickel-yttria stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anodes are prone to deterioration at high temperatures and high humidity.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: This paper focuses on effects in anode microstructure on performance and durability of microtubular SOFCs.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: The evaluations were conducted under high steam content and internal methane reforming conditions using Ni-YSZ anodes using acrylic resin and graphite pore formers.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: The initial cell performance was almost identical to that of SOFCs with anodes using acrylic resin and graphite pore formers in 40% H-2-3% H2O at 700 degrees C. However, the anode using acrylic resin deteriorated rapidly in 40% H-2-30% H2O over a period of 28 h.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: Furthermore, it generated almost no electric power by internal steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: The local oxidation of nickel particles was observed at the interface between the electrolyte and the deteriorated anodes.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: The anode using graphite pore former provided stable power generation in 40% H-2-30% H2O, and was able to generate power in 10% CH4-30% H2O.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: The pore formers strongly affect fuel diffusivity in the SOFC anodes, which is an important factor in stable internal steam reforming of methane.
Titulo: Effects of anode microstructures on durability of microtubular solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of methane
